Class Automaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automaton
  • public class Automaton
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a full elementary cellular automaton which can be evolved, represented as a string, and past/future generations can be inspected.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Automaton​(int ruleNum, Generation initial)
      Initializes the Automaton.
      Automaton​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Initializes an Automaton from a file.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void evolve​(int numSteps)
      Evolves the current generation the amount of steps specified further.
      Generation getGeneration​(int stepNum)
      Gets the generation of the specific step number, if it does not exist, then evolve the generation until it is reached.
      int getRuleNum()
      Returns the rule number.
      int getTotalSteps()
      Get the total amount of times a generation has evolved.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
      void saveEvolution​(java.lang.String filename)
      Saves the elementary cellular automaton to a file.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the elementary cellular automaton into a visual representation using true and false symbols.

      • evolve

        public void evolve​(int numSteps)
        Evolves the current generation the amount of steps specified further.
        Parameters:
        numSteps - The amount of steps to evolve the generation.

      • getGeneration

        public Generation getGeneration​(int stepNum)
        Gets the generation of the specific step number, if it does not exist, then evolve the generation until it is reached.
        Parameters:
        stepNum - The step number that should be used to get that generation.
        Returns:
        Returns the generation from the given step.

      • getTotalSteps

        public int getTotalSteps()
        Get the total amount of times a generation has evolved.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of times a generation has been evolved.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts the elementary cellular automaton into a visual representation using true and false symbols.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string that is representative of the elementary cellular automaton.

      • saveEvolution

        public void saveEvolution​(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the elementary cellular automaton to a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename that the file is saved as.
